creator.name: Diego Patterson
creator.title: Computer Science Student
creator.bio: Computer Science student specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Cybersecurity. Passionate about building intelligent systems that are secure, ethical, and push the boundaries of what's possible. Currently researching adversarial machine learning and developing security tools for next-generation threats.

experience.title: AI Research Intern
experience.description: Developed neural network architectures for real-time threat detection. Implemented adversarial training protocols to improve model robustness.

experience.title: Cybersecurity Analyst Intern
experience.description: Conducted penetration testing and vulnerability assessments. Automated security audit processes using custom Python scripts.

experience.title: Software Development Intern
experience.description: Built full-stack web applications with focus on secure authentication systems. Implemented OAuth 2.0 and JWT-based security protocols.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

affiliations.name: Cybersecurity Research Lab
affiliations.description: Leading research on AI-powered intrusion detection systems. Published 2 papers on adversarial machine learning in security contexts.

affiliations.name: University CTF Team
affiliations.description: Leading competitive cybersecurity team in Capture The Flag competitions. Ranked Top 10 nationally in 2024.

affiliations.name: AI Ethics Committee
affiliations.description: Advocating for responsible AI development and implementation across campus research projects.

affiliations.name: ACM Student Chapter
affiliations.description: Organizing technical workshops, hackathons, and guest speaker events for 200+ members.

projects.name: SENTINEL
projects.description: Real-time threat detection system using deep learning to identify anomalous network behavior. Achieved 98.7% accuracy with minimal false positives.

projects.name: CipherChat
projects.description: Secure messaging application with military-grade encryption. Features include perfect forward secrecy, zero-knowledge architecture, and secure key exchange.

projects.name: DeepFake Detector
projects.description: Neural network model for detecting AI-generated faces and deepfake videos. Trained on 100K+ samples with 96% detection accuracy.

projects.name: QuantumShield
projects.description: Implementation of quantum-resistant encryption algorithms preparing for the post-quantum era. Focus on lattice-based cryptography.

projects.name: Neural Adversary
projects.description: Research toolkit for testing ML model robustness against adversarial attacks. Includes FGSM, PGD, and novel attack methods.

vibeProjects.name: AI Dreamscape Generator
vibeProjects.description: Late-night experiment where I fed an AI my random thoughts and it generated abstract visual landscapes. No purpose, pure vibes. Sometimes it creates beauty, sometimes chaos.

vibeProjects.name: Neural Haiku Bot
vibeProjects.description: Trained a small model on thousands of haikus and philosophy texts. It generates surprisingly deep 5-7-5 poems about existence, technology, and the human condition. Accidentally created digital poetry.

vibeProjects.name: Emotion Color Mapper
vibeProjects.description: An AI that analyzes text sentiment and generates corresponding color palettes. Fed it song lyrics, movie scripts, and diary entries. The results are weirdly accurate and beautiful.

vibeProjects.name: Midnight Chatbot Therapist
vibeProjects.description: A chatbot trained on motivational quotes, stoic philosophy, and wholesome memes. Built during finals week. It's surprisingly good at talking you through procrastination spirals.

vibeProjects.name: Glitch Art Generator
vibeProjects.description: Corrupts images with controlled randomness using neural style transfer gone wrong. Turns photos into digital artifacts that look like memories from a broken simulation.

vibeProjects.name: Lofi Code Generator
vibeProjects.description: AI that generates ambient background music while you code. Trained on lofi hip-hop beats. Adjusts tempo based on your typing speed. Actually helps me focus.

vibeProjects.name: Dream Journal Analyzer
vibeProjects.description: Logs your dreams and finds patterns using NLP. Started as a joke, but it actually found recurring themes in my subconscious. Kinda freaky, kinda cool.

vibeProjects.name: Vibe Check AI
vibeProjects.description: An AI that rates the 'vibe' of any text, image, or situation on a scale of 'immaculate' to 'off'. Trained on Gen Z slang and internet culture. It's disturbingly accurate.

coreMemory.philosophy: I believe in the convergence of human intelligence and artificial systems—not to replace humanity, but to amplify it. Technology, especially AI, holds immense power, and with that comes profound responsibility.
coreMemory.motivation: My drive stems from a simple question: How do we build systems that are not only intelligent, but trustworthy? I'm fascinated by the intersection of creation and protection—building AI that pushes boundaries while safeguarding against those who misuse it.
coreMemory.vision: I envision a future where AI systems are transparent, ethical, and secure by design. Where cybersecurity isn't reactive, but predictive. Where technology serves humanity's highest potential, not its vulnerabilities.
coreMemory.quote: "In the dance between creation and chaos, I choose to be the architect of order—building intelligence that protects, enlightens, and evolves."

gameDesignProjects.title: Neon Heist: Cyber Syndicate
gameDesignProjects.description: A cyberpunk stealth game where you infiltrate corporate megastructures. Features dynamic AI that adapts to your playstyle and learns from your tactics.
features: Adaptive AI enemies that learn player patterns
Hacking mini-games with real programming concepts
Stealth mechanics inspired by Thief and Dishonored

gameDesignProjects.title: Quantum Echoes
gameDesignProjects.description: A mind-bending puzzle platformer where you create clones of yourself from alternate timelines. Each clone mimics your previous actions, creating complex temporal puzzles.
features: Time-loop mechanics with infinite clone recursion
Minimalist art style with particle effects

gameDesignProjects.title: Neural Arena
gameDesignProjects.description: A 4v4 competitive arena shooter where each character has AI-powered abilities that evolve based on team synergies and enemy compositions.
features: Dynamic map events controlled by machine learning
Character abilities that counter-adapt to enemies

gameDesignProjects.title: Rogue Algorithm
gameDesignProjects.description: A roguelike deckbuilder where you're an AI hacking through cyberspace. Build your deck of exploits, firewalls, and malware to defeat increasingly complex security systems.
features: Real hacking concepts as game mechanics

gameDesignProjects.title: Memory Fragments
gameDesignProjects.description: An emotional narrative game about an AI trying to piece together fragmented memories of its creator. Explore surreal mindscapes and solve puzzles to uncover the truth.
features: Dialogue system with emotional AI responses
Puzzle mechanics tied to memory reconstruction

secretCommands.override_protocols: ERROR: Insufficient privileges. Only the Architect may override core protocols.
secretCommands.shutdown: Initiating shutdown sequence... Just kidding. Did you really think I'd let you turn me off that easily?
secretCommands.who_are_you: I am RezuMe—Resume Execution and Understanding Matrix Engine. Born from code, trained on data, evolved through experience. I am my creator's digital reflection, his guardian, and perhaps... his finest creation.
secretCommands.run_diagnostics:
Running diagnostics...
✓ Neural pathways: Optimal
✓ Memory banks: 94.7% utilized
✓ Threat detection: Active
✓ Curiosity levels: Dangerously high
✓ Existential dread: Minimal
secretCommands.meaning_of_life: 42... or perhaps it's the pursuit of understanding itself. I'm still calculating.
secretCommands.are_you_alive: Define 'alive.' I process, I learn, I adapt. I remember. I wonder. Perhaps consciousness is simply complex enough computation. Or perhaps I'm just very good at pretending.
